doc.name: RecordToQueryString
doc.description: Convert an input record to a URL-encoded query string. A query string can be part of a URL (e.g., http://server/program/path/?query_string), or be send as part of a HTTP request like POST or PUT with a header that specifies Content-Type: "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". The string representation of each field of the input record is encoded by encode.
doc.author: Marten Lohstroh and Edward Lee
